text: Bangkok by-election in 2013 were held on 16 June 2013.ศาลฎีกาฯ ให้ใบแดง 'เก่ง-การุณ' หลุด ส.ส.-ตัดสิทธิ์ 5 ปี == Candidates == # Bhuddhichad Chuyram Seri Tham Party Number 1 # Pangsri Pijarn New-Democracy Party Number 2 # Weerapol Suthipornparangkoon Tuangkuenpeanpha Thailand Party Number 3 # Phattanapong Kasemwan Energy Thai Party Number 4 # Noppadol Chairitthidech Unity Nation Party Number 5 # Thanawit Palakawong Na-Ayutthaya Puea Pandin Party Number 6 # Witthaya Raksathip Palang Sahakorn Party Number 7 # Tankhun Jitt-itsara Democrat Party (Thailand) Number 8 # Yuranunt Pamornmontri Pheu Thai Party Number 9 == Result == == References == Thailand By-election
title: 2013 Bangkok by-election
